results.content: Nice oral presentation, obvious efforts to share his skills to beginners. Unlike other courses, this is not overedited, or way too slow ; this hasn't gazillions of things to look at at the same time. Straight to the point, gives enough tools to go lookup more advanced tutorials on your own on the Internet and learning new HTML functions. i.e. that's what an introduction is made for. +1

results.content: Instructions are very Clear , Informative and Organized. I am learning new things , and new tools to use in creating a website. I just have a question thou. If I want to post my own photo , how will I do it? I don't want to use photos from google to avoid copyrights. Thank you !

response.content: thanks for the review.   To post you own images you can upload them and link to them using the img tag.  Please post a question in the course and we can discuss further.
